Sorry for my bad english..what im meant is does this app had the ability to access lyrics from id tags without having to connect to the internet? Anyway..great work man..thank you

Yup! It does. Writing will come later but reading definitely works.  QuickLyric looks for lyrics from the following sources: 1) The saved lyrics database 2) The lyrics tag in the file 3) the internet. You can see an example here: https://goo.gl/kngyQN

Cheers! (Don't forget to update your review :))

title: Not work
comment: 1) No auto change lyrics, is stuck at Bad, a song I did not play, and says "No need to refresh". I am trying with different good folder players, i.e. Music Folder Player,  Ez Folder Player. 1) It does auto update the lyrics, it's just that your music player (Sony Walkman?) is not standard and you need to use a better music player. Download any music player and that will fix your issues. It is not my fault. 2) Not a good idea. 3) Please, email when you have trouble instead of directly trying to hurt my ranking... :)

title: Lacks some basic features.
comment: I'm a musician looking for a simple lyric manager.  If you want something to sing along to your MP3s then this review is probably not helpful.  No editing of lyrics. No "back" button.  Throws you out if you use phone's Back. Have to start over when thrown out. Have to start over when screen saver interrupts.  App should disallow screen saver and confirm quit. Default lyric is last one you listed to (or not!) with no navigation forward and back and no way to clear it. When searching, it Never finds the obvious target, rather you must select Genius every time.  really??  Does not stick on that setting. It's just not very user friendly but it is easy to search and find lyrics to a lot of songs that are not your target. It DOES present very neat lyrics.  Good job on that. No place to write a review from within app..  Had to go to Google's Play website. Finally, I think it told me on install but I can find reference to where the downloads are saved.  Would love to transfer my downloads to another app.

Hello Jerry :) Regarding your expectations, well, apologies but this is simply not what this is for.. Couldn't you tell from the description? Search is really a lesser/secondary feature. I've answered most of your questions over on pastebin: (no space left here..) http://pastebin.com/JRRUmY1N Cheers!

title: Awesome. Didn't know I wanted it til I got it.
comment: When I was a teenager, I used to go to the local library, download Metallica lyrics, clean them up real nice, and print them out, put them in those cheap blue report covers with the three brads, you know the kind. Recessed space for the title sticker, kinda slick? Anyway, I had one for each Metallica album. I spent so much time on my lyrics books. Now this app comes along, gives me lyrics without me even having to ask. Also got on Wi-Fi and downloaded all the lyrics at once. That was great too.

It does have it, look at the screenshots. You enabled "Large Font" in the (accessibility) settings of your device, which causes QuickLyric to use a font readable by dyslexic people. Use a normal text size if you don't want the special font. Also, just send an email next time :)

title: Pretty and Cool
comment: The app has a really lean and pretty material design based UI and ADs-free. It can fetch the lyrics of the song that's being played and can also download and save the lyrics for all the songs in your library at one click.    Update: Okay, the dev explained why the feature I requested (to display lyrics as a floating notification) isn't possible. In that case, this app is perfect just the way it is. A minor issue: while scrolling, the swirling animation for the refresh button isn't being rendered correctly.

Hello Subhodeep,
This would require a database that knows exactly when to display each line of every song in the world. QuickLyric is a free project and it's simply not possible for me to do that without putting ads everywhere. I don't believe that's what you want.. Cheers! 
PS:consider updating your review

Edit: The refresh button is fixed in 1.8

title: Great lyric app
comment: On the top right corner click on it and click on settings and make sure auto save lyrics is checked off. This has a search button if u know what you are looking for. If u don't know this has a left corner menu. Click on it and click on saved lyrics. You will see a blank box until u save lyrics then u will see all the saved lyrics you saved. Look at the top right corner you will see a cloud with an arrow. Click on it then click on the device songs and it will automatically add lyrics to songs u have.

title: Nicely Done!
comment: I use Spotify exclusively as my music source and this app works great! Wish list: Album art.

Hey Joe :) Album artworks were originally part of the app, but Google asked me to remove them due to copyright infringement. For the time being, it is not possible. However I might have a workaround for you if you email me.. I'm glad you like the app and I hope you'll consider updating your review :).

title: Beat lyrics app out there
comment: Beautiful design, easy to read and fast as lightning. There's a reason it's called 'QuickLyric': it simple works. No unnecessary quirks.

comment: This is a no nonsense, really useful app. Does what it says and looks beautiful doing so.
Execelent!

comment: Great app but would like option to have the app pop up like when the song changes (if it was in the background), or something like facebook messenger that has a little icon and when you click it it will expand. Any possibility of working with youtube or viralite, etc.
You can enable notifications in the settings. Anything more than that is discouraged by Google. :)

Youtube is not supported, only music players.

title: Quick
comment: Works very quickly and hasn't missed one yet

title: Amazing
comment: But there are some missing lyrics
Hey Andrea! Please send me an email so I can look into your issues.
Good app...
Doesn't seem to work with Pandora One.  Thanks for your response, I'll send a message to Pandora and ask them to support scrobble. Like others have said, it works great on everything else.

Pandora is a radio service and doesn't tell other apps which track is playing like a standard player would. Therefore it's not possible for me to make it work, sorry.. You should instead complain to them and ask that they support Scrobbling, because they are the ones responsible.
With that said, I invite you to consider updating your review. Cheers

title: Samsung  galaxy s3
comment: Great app

Hey bernard, I'm glad you like the app. If you have any issue, do not hesitate to email me. If you don't, I invite you to consider updating your review. A 3 star review is actually not a very good score and it hurts my ranking. :)

title: Love it!
comment: Great! Not floating, which is annoying! Love it! Love it! Love it! Thank you so much!
Glad you like it, Riley. :) Be sure to tell all your friends!
Love it!!!!

title: Great app!!!
comment: I heard about this app on the Android App Addicts podcast.  It was specifically recommended to me, because I like to sing.   I tried it out (kicked the tires pretty hard) and I have to say I love it!  It worked flawlessly in Google music and Slacker.  It even finds lyrics for new and obscure songs (it missed once out 100).  I highly recommend this app!

I would give it 5 stars and kept using it, but I have a great deal of trouble reading the font. I'm very sure it is my eyes. If I could change the font, to something I could see, I would still use it. Great program otherwise.

Hi Tom! Glad you like the app. I actually thought about people with eye problems! If you go to the accessibility settings on your phone and enable "Large Text", not only will the text be larger but the font will also change to something much easier to read. Tell me how that works out for you :)

title: Works (almost) flawlessly
comment: It's light-weight, easy to use, crap free and accurate for well-known English speaking musician. But it doesn't work for non-English music, which is a bit disappointment since I listen to a lot of Japanese and Icelandic songs. Maybe next release ?
Japanese music is hard to deal with since your files could be tagged in Hiragana or in Romaji. Could you email me the names of a couple of songs so I can look into it?

title: Excellent!!
comment: Perfect app.... Keep it up!!
Glad you like it :) Be sure to tell all your friends about it.

title: Love it!!!!
comment: It's so use full for when I just want to know the lyrics to a song or just right the lyrics down to show my friends

But when I opened the app, it was sleek and professional and really really good! Great job developers! 5 stars from me!

Thank you for your kind words Kourush :) I'm constantly working on new features which I hope you'll like.
In the meantime, it's up to you guys to make it "world famous". Be sure to tell your friends about it!

title: Best lyrics player
comment: This is the best lyrics player on the play store. I've tried multiple ones and so far this is the simplest, most gorgeous and light lyrics player. Also very stable.
very good! is it possible to add multilingual support like russian (to determine Russian songs not Russian UI) and is it conceived shade to spin with update button?

Hello. Glad you like the app :)
The shadow only spins on KitKat, so I was not aware of that until yesterday.
I will try to fix it.

Expanding the catalog of songs (to Russian for instance) is planned.

comment: No Deezer synced music support, always shows me Bad by Michael Jackson
Seems like Deezer removed Scrobbing from their app. Best thing you can do is email them. Sorry for the inconvenience but this is on them.

Hi Punit, Bollywood Music is now part of the catalog. Let me know if you encounter issues and don't forget to update your review!

comment: Doesn't work on Shuttle Music Player. Works nicely and it looks very clean.

It does for me. Did you enable scrobbling as instructed? The Shuttle Music Player dev doesn't seem to have any problem.

comment: Yellow isn't the most pleasant color to look at, in my opinion. Night mode would be appreciated for reduced eye strain
Hi Oscar! A 2nd theme and a night mode have been available for a while now. Are you satisfied? :) If you are, please consider updating your review.

title: Awesome 😁
comment: Could you add night mode? You know, white text on black background.. Thanks! Update: Thanks for the dark theme. title: Perfect

title: Great app but how do I go back to search results?
comment: This app is very slick but I havent figured out a way to look at a search result and then go back to the search result list. Any chance you could add a back to search results button? !?

title: Do you need anything else?
comment: This is an AWESOME app! Love the design and anytime I'm listening to indie music on my "All access account" on Google PlayMusic I can find the lyrics too a good song, instantly! Just press the "Home" button tap the "QuickLyric" app and BAM Lyrics in real time!

title: Fantastic!
comment: Much less intrusive than musixmatch and also material design!

title: AMAZING
comment: No special permissions? SOLD.

title: Bloody brilliant!
comment: This is THE app for music lovers! It's pretty brilliant if you ask me. All it does is pull the lyrics of the music that you're listening to without any notifications or hassle. It is simple, yet powerful. Of course it comes with the beautiful Material Design makeover. Love this app!

title: it gets the job done!
comment: I like the design and like it being simple.   just two things, show up in notification and add font and layout options..

Notifications are now part of the app. Regarding the font, make sure you don't have "large text" enabled in the accessibility settings of your phone. Glad you like QuickLyric. Don't forget to update your review ;)

title: Fantastic!
comment: Delivers exactly what it promises. I love that it's automatic. Best app of its kind! Only thing I'd want is an option to auto-save all lyrics and a widget.

title: So easy to use I can't believe it
comment: For the longest time I've been googling to find lyrics and eventually coming to lyrics freak or another site.  Then have to deal with advertisements. This is a great app that will keep me from doing that anymore.

title: Finally!
comment: Great app gets rid of all the junk from usual lyric sites. Now my go to for lyrics.

title: Simple but awesome
comment: Great solid app with a wonderful material design. The only thing I'd suggest is an option to display lyrics automatically when a song begins playing.

Hi Kenny!
What do you mean exactly? Do you want the lyrics to appear outside the app (floating)?

Unfortunately, I can't implement this for the time being as I don't have access to a database that supports synced lyrics. Maybe someday!
Cool idea, works great

title: Beautifully executed
comment: Replaced Musixmatch Lyrics for me.

title: Solid app, clean design, a bit too minimal, but that's better too much.
comment: This just instantly replaced Musixmatch for me.  For those reading, this is a super convenient lyric reading app. Good choice of color and design (Material certainly doesn't look hard to adapt, but then again even Google has trouble with consistency), incredibly easy to use, super minimal, and totally free. It's just what you need in a lyric app.

title: Great
comment: I will definitely be using this app often. Super easy and quick. Looks good too! Thank you!

title: Great UI, does exactly what you'd like it do
comment: Fetches lyrics really fast, works smoothly.
